item.title: Our Core Values
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1431670151170{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}" parallax_speed="0.3"][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][stm_sidebar sidebar="801"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1431070873695{padding-left: 45px !important;}" el_class="right_column" offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1429773153319{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_icon_box icon="stm-handshake" icon_size="34" icon_height="65" title="INTEGRITY" style="icon_left" icon_width="50"]A tradition of ethical and honest business conduct is the cornerstone of our business philosophy, and the foundation of our entire organization.[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_icon_box icon="stm-eye" icon_size="28" icon_height="65" title="VISION" style="icon_left" icon_width="50"]We clearly identify our clients goals and visualize innovative solutions, using careful planning and proactive communication to achieve unparalleled results.[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1429773159549{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_icon_box icon="stm-builder-2" icon_size="39" icon_height="65" title="STAFF" style="icon_left" icon_width="50"]Our people is our success by delivering customer solutions. Therefore we strive continually to attract and retain talented professionals who share our values.[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_icon_box icon="stm-shield" icon_size="39" icon_height="65" title="SAFETY" style="icon_left" icon_width="50"]We focus on consistently upholding the highest standards of safety, ensuring that all workers and the public go home each and every day.[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1429773159549{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_icon_box icon="stm-like" icon_size="37" icon_height="65" title="QUALITY" style="icon_left" icon_width="50"]We provide outstanding service through teamwork, experience, accountability and innovation all of which is reflected in the quality of our results.[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_icon_box icon="stm-innovation" icon_size="37" icon_height="65" title="INNOVATION" style="icon_left" icon_width="50"]We continually seek new and enterprising ways, whether technology- or process-based, to meet our customers needs and exceed their expectations.[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1429773159549{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_icon_box icon="stm-bargraph" icon_size="40" icon_height="65" title="CONTINUOUS IMPROVEMENT" style="icon_left" icon_width="50"]We cultivate an environment that supports and encourages ongoing learning, development and personal growth.[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_icon_box icon="stm-checkmark_1" icon_size="42" icon_height="65" title="OPERATIONAL EXCELLENCE" style="icon_left" icon_width="50"]We provide the best value to our customers by continuously refining our processes and cost structure.[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

SERVICE BROCHURE

As the general contractor, we first create the highest level of trust and integrity with our clients.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1431244599654{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

GENERAL CONTRACTINGSERVICES

General contracting, often referred to as a traditional delivery system, allows the owner to engage with the architect/engineer to prepare the design of the entire project. Upon design completion, the project scope is competitively bid to a construction firm for a fixed lump sum.This approach is most ideally suited for straightforward projects with well-established and clearly defined roles for every member of the project team and is typically not the best solution for complex, phased, or highly-invasive projects. Our responsibilities when serving as the General Contractor include:
  • Providing all materials, labor, equipment and services
  • Subcontracting with various trade and specialty contractors
  • Applying for or assisting in the application process for building permits
  • Monitoring schedule and cash flow
  • Maintaining accurate records
  • Ensuring a safe and secure project site

  • Single point of accountability and contact for the client
